Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0396 affecting package bind for versions less than 9.16.29-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-0396 affecting package bind for versions less than 9.16.29-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package bind is earlier than 9.16.29-1, affected by CVE-2022-0396
